title: Establishment of 165MW, AC Ground Mounted Solar PV Power Plants in 1-5 MW, AC capacity
decision_details:
- Bids have been invited for the development of projects up to 165MW for 20 grid substations, and the approval of the Cabinet has been granted at the Cabinet meeting held on 2024‑09‑02 to award the contracts for other locations except for Anuradhapura, Galle and Deniyaya grid substations. The appeals submitted by the unsuccessful bidders for the Anuradhapura, Galle and Deniyaya grid substations have been rejected by the Procurement Appeal Board. Accordingly, based on the recommendations of the Cabinet Appointed Negotiation Committee, the proposal made by the Minister of Power and Energy to award the relevant contracts as mentioned below, was approved by the Cabinet.
